QuestData.Title: Mog'dorg the Wizened
QuestData.Description: Mog'dorg wise! Him send Grok to city, look for help. Bloodmaul clan need help.$B$BMog'dorg say, send powerful little ones to him at Blade's Edge Mountains. Him stand on tower at Circle of Blood. Mog'dorg wise!
QuestData.LogDescription: Visit Mog'dorg the Wizened atop one of the towers just outside the Circle of Blood in the Blade's Edge Mountains.
QuestData.RewardText: Grok said that I am wise? I don't know about that.$B$BPerhaps it is because I am the only one in my clan that is truly trying to save us from annihilation by the Bladespire clan, and Gruul and his sons, who are backing them.$B$BI hope that you have come to deliver us from certain doom, $C.
